definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: a barley-measure (NH id., a corn-measure); only in [[שְׂעׂרִים]] ´[[חׂמֶר־שְׂעׂרִים וְל]] Ho 3:2; acc. to Vulgate = 1/2 [[כּׂר]] = 1/2 [[חׂמֶר]] (q.v.), cf. Mish. (Levy:NHWB ii. 531), but this tradition is uncertain (cf. Now:Arch. i. 203); LXX ne)bel oi)/nou, for ´[[שׂ]] ´[[ל]].
